ip.name: Ip API
ip.command_comments: Retrieves ip address, city , timezone, geolocation, country, etc
ip.description_line1: An API to find your location, city, ip address, timezone,
ip.description_line2: country geo location and weather, news, and more.

weather.name: Open Weather API
weather.description_line1: Access current weather data for any location including over 200,000 cities
weather.description_line2: Current weather is frequently updated based on global models and data from more than 40,000 weather stations

forecast.name: Open Weather API
forecast.description_line1: Access current weather data for any location including over 200,000 cities
forecast.description_line2: Current weather is frequently updated based on global models and data from more than 40,000 weather stations
